screens.title: CSS 样式透传演示
screens.dsl:
[HERO: main]
  { Align: "Center" }
  CSS: "bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-900 via-purple-900 to-indigo-900 min-h-screen"
  [BADGE: tag]
    CONTENT: "Stitch UI Engine"
    CSS: "bg-blue-500/20 text-blue-300 border border-blue-400/30"
  [HEADING: title1]
    ATTR: Size("XL")
    CONTENT: "JSON Schema 驱动的"
    CSS: "text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-400 to-purple-400"
  [HEADING: title2]
    ATTR: Size("XL")
    CONTENT: "下一代 UI 渲染引擎"
    CSS: "text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-400 to-pink-400"
  [TEXT: desc]
    CONTENT: "一套 Schema，多端渲染。支持 React 实时预览、LiveView 服务端运行、静态 HTML 导出。"
    CSS: "text-gray-300 max-w-2xl mx-auto"
  [GRID: features]
    { Columns: "3", Gap: "LG" }
    CSS: "mt-12"
    [CARD: f1]
      ATTR: Title("组件化"), Icon("Layers")
      CONTENT: "50+ 预置组件"
      CSS: "bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm border-white/20 hover:bg-white/20 transition-all"
    [CARD: f2]
      ATTR: Title("响应式"), Icon("Smartphone")
      CONTENT: "多端自适应"
      CSS: "bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm border-white/20 hover:bg-white/20 transition-all"
    [CARD: f3]
      ATTR: Title("AI 友好"), Icon("Zap")
      CONTENT: "智能组装"
      CSS: "bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm border-white/20 hover:bg-white/20 transition-all"
  [FLEX: buttons]
    { Gap: "MD", Justify: "Center" }
    CSS: "mt-8"
    [BUTTON: start]
      ATTR: Variant("default"), Size("LG")
      CONTENT: "开始使用"
      CSS: "bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-purple-500 hover:from-blue-600 hover:to-purple-600 shadow-lg shadow-purple-500/25"
    [BUTTON: docs]
      ATTR: Variant("outline"), Size("LG")
      CONTENT: "查看文档"
      CSS: "border-white/30 text-white hover:bg-white/10"
